Experience

PlayStation (SIE)

Software Engineer

September 2022 - Present

Designed and implemented a web-based automation framework from scratch using Python, PyTest, and Playwright; integrated plugins for third-party tools such as qTest and Applitools for enhanced test execution and reporting. Dockerized the QA environment, enabling developers to run tests seamlessly without the need for manual dependency installation or complex configuration setups. Maintained and enhanced the existing automation framework to test PlayStation 5â€™s Home and Library Console Applications, while adhering to the Page Object Model to ensure consistent test coverage and product quality. Contributed to a common library used by QE engineers across the organization to build and scale their own test automation frameworks. Coordinate with product owners, product managers and developers to gather all requirements of new features to create thorough and robust test plans for both manual and automated tests Integrated Jenkins CI/CD pipeline with Git to automatically trigger sanity and smoke builds on pull requests and run nightly regression test suites Actively participate in Agile ceremonies including sprint planning, backlog grooming, and sprint retrospectives, ensuring that testing requirements and priorities align with the development team's goals. Lead all testing efforts for major and minor releases, including functional, longevity, stress, localization, accessibility, app dependency, performance, and telemetry testing. Review PRs from both developers and QE engineers, ensuring product/code quality, functionality, and adherence to best practices. Authored and maintain comprehensive documentation for QE processes, resulting in more effective knowledge transfer and onboarding for new members

Cisco

Software Engineer

July 2020 - August 2022

Created and maintained automation frameworks as well as utilized scripting languages such as Python to automate feature test scripts for the pre-release software of Ciscoâ€™s SDA web application Tested and automated Rest APIâ€™s, network traffic flows and Cisco Cat9k switching device side triggers for each new feature release Worked on a scrum methodology using CDETS and Jira for defect tracking as well as collaborated with developers to follow up on and verify defects and issues Performed end-to-end and black box testing for each software release Followed protocol for defect tracking and reporting, which included logging bugs in a detailed and reproducible way and provide relevant error logs and screenshots/recordings Designed and implemented automation framework to maintain the data integrity and validity of Microsoft Power BI dashboards by using Python and query languages such as DAX and PSQL

Cisco

Software Engineering Intern

May 2019 - August 2019

Assisted on the ETL process from Teradata to Postgres within the CCFS organization Utilized the Python packages sqlalchemy and teradatasql to extract data from Teradata and load it onto Postgres Designed a program to preserve the integrity of the data after it was transformed Led and organized weekly meetings where interns learned to improve presentation skills
